answers.answer: I also failed my 1 hour and am currently waiting for my results of the 3 hour one I took this morning. Ive read that theres quite a few women who failed the 1 hour pass the 3 hour one. I wish you luck!
I failed my one hour and passed my 3 hour with flying colors! Most who fail the 1 hour do pass the 3 hour. Best of luck!

I failed the 1 hr, I go back Friday for the 3 hr...I'm nervous. I hope I pass this time. I think it was my fault I failed the first time, I ate after midnight:/ I also work graveyards, that means no lunch for me.

Thanks!! Best of luck to u ladies too! I didnt do anything diffrent than last time I did it with my last pregnancy. I have a feeling I do have it though :/ I feel groggy alot after I eat and still puke throughout the day and im 29 w. Idk if its just in my head though so my fingers are crossed, for you ladies too!

question: So I failed my glucose test , have any of you ladies failed the first but passed the three hour one?
title: diabetes test
